part.p: A projectile is launched from the ground. The horizontal range of the flight equals the maximum height. What is the launch angle \(\theta\)?

choicegroup.choice: The problem is impossible to solve; the missing information is the maximum height only.
The problem is impossible to solve; the missing information is the value of g only.
The problem is impossible to solve; the missing information is the maximum velocity only.
The problem is impossible to solve; the missing information is the maximum height and the initial velocity.
The problem is impossible to solve; the missing information is the maximum height and the value of g.
The problem is impossible to solve; the missing information is the initial velocity and the value of g.
